page.title: 04LIFE ON THE SANDFORD ESTATE
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT 2 SURVEYS.THERE IS AN AVERAGE OF 4.8 PEOPLE IN EACH HOUSE. MOST PUPILS LIVE IN COUNCIL HOUSES.OF THOSE IN WORK MOST ARE IN SERVICE INDUSTRY AND A THIRD OF THE PEOPLE SURVEYED ARE UNEMPLOYED. MOST PEOPLE WERE BORN IN LEEDS. 4 PEOPLE WHO HAVE LIVED ON THE ESTATE FOR OVER 30 YEARS SAID "THE AREA HAS DETERIORATED BECAUSE OF THE VANDLES. BUT HELP FOR THE ELDERLY AND HOUSING HAVE IMPROVED." "THE PLAYGROUND GAMES CHILDREN PLAY HAVE NOT CHANGED,MARBLES,TAG AND SKIPPING. HERE IS A SKIPPING RHYME,NOT LAST NIGHT BUT THE NIGHT BEFORE,24 ROBBERS KNOCKED AT MY DOOR,THIS IS WHAT THEY SAID,SPANISH LADY TURN AROUND,SPANISH LADY DO THE SPLITS, SPANISH LADY 2,4,6
